law.catch_line: Placement of resealed bottle of wine during transport.
law.text: If a patron removes a resealed bottle of wine from the premises of a restaurant as provided for in KRS 243.115, any resealed bottle of wine that is transported in a motor vehicle shall be placed in a locked glove compartment or the trunk or other area that is not a passenger area under KRS 189.530(5).
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006.
